body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Griffin Motors. My name is Eric Griffin. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Anna. How do you spell your last name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you provide me with your phone number, starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Anna. Can you also confirm your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Anna, for providing your contact info. Is there anything else you'd like to share or discuss today before we end our conversation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all, thank you. I'm feeling happy with the service provided.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Anna. We appreciate your business and hope to assist you again soon. Have a great day!
